EmailTemplate.name: 08.2 On Shelf to Ship to Client
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Order.Account_Name__c} Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c}/Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} is Ready to Ship
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please prepare shipping labels for Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c} and copy the carrier and tracking information to Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c}. Shipping information should be included on the invoice and added to Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber}. If there are any questions, please forward them to {!Order.OwnerEmail}. Please confirm in hands date for this job and adjust shipping rates/times as necessary.
